posts.post_content:
Posted By: Anonymous
First,



Let me thank everyone on BST for a tremendously successful listing of my T206 cards.  I had an overwhelming response and am very appreciative.  In fact only 282 cards remain -- WOW!



The following cards remain.  While I would love to sell them ALL on BST -- I will likely list those cards that don't sell, on ebay shortly:



Any offer which reflects fair market value will be accepted.  Please contact me by email for purchases over $2000 to discuss details.
